titleStmt.title: A commentary on the five books of Moses with a dissertation concerning the author or writer of the said books, and a general argument of each of them / by Richard, Lord Bishop of Bath and Wells ; in two volumes.
titleStmt.author: Kidder, Richard, 1633-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Heptinstall, for William Rogers ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library and Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

"The first part of Moses, called Genesis", "The book of Exodus", "The third book of Moses, called Leviticus", "The fourth book of Moses, called Numbers", and "The fifth book of Moses, called Deuteronomy" have half-title pages.
Pages 359-379 from v. 1; pages 75-96, 218-241, 375-431, and 499-520 from v. 2 from Union Theological Seminary Library, New York copy spliced at end.
